reason.raw: Already in the prerelease branch using multidistribution layout which will go to default.
reason.html: Already in the prerelease branch using multidistribution layout which will go to default.

description.html:
Current gazebo package depends on libavcodec53. This libavcode53libavcodec53 package seems to provide the same files that ones provided by libavcodec53-extra libavcodec53-extra. One blocks the other so only one can be installed in the system at the same time.

@nkoenig found that when trying to install new gazebo version, apt ask him to uninstall his libavcodec-extra-53 package to install gazebo.

This pull request makes gazebo to depend on one of this two options.

title.raw: avcodec libraries are provided by two packages. Make gazebo to depend on
title.html: avcodec libraries are provided by two packages. Make gazebo to depend on

title: avcodec libraries are provided by two packages. Make gazebo to depend on

reason: Already in the prerelease branch using multidistribution layout which will go to default.
